description: Lists information about a connector's operation(s).

parameters.name: connectorArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the connector for which to list operations.

nested_items.name: connectorOperations
nested_items.description: An array of connector operation descriptions.

nested_items.name: connectorOperationArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the connector operation.

nested_items.name: connectorOperationType
nested_items.description: The type of connector operation performed.

nested_items.name: connectorOperationState
nested_items.description: The state of the connector operation.

nested_items.name: creationTime
nested_items.description: The time when operation was created.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: If the response is truncated, it includes a NextToken. Send this NextToken in a subsequent request to continue listing from where it left off.
